message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this unique product with you. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?

I understand that you have a limited budget, Bob, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $8000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $12000? I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. I'm really interested in it, but I need to stay within my budget. Can we meet at $9000?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. How about we meet at $11000? It's a bit higher than your last offer, but I think it's still a fair price for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $11000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I'm really interested in it, and I think this price is fair considering our previous discussions. Can we meet at $9500?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession, but I need to think about my bottom line. How about we meet at $10500? It's a bit higher than your last offer, but I'm starting to get a bit anxious about the price dropping too low. I think this is my final concession.

I understand that you're trying to make one last concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and our previous discussions. Can we meet at $9800?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $10000, Bob. I've made several concessions already, and I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer.
